html:
1.21.18  4:40 pm   Is the universe real

     i will check

1.21.18  4:37 pm   would u perform songs shorter than 20 seconds on tour?

     yes, and longer

1.21.18  4:33 pm   What is your favourite place on earth?

     i'd say right on the surface

1.21.18  4:13 pm   if you wrote an autobiography, what would its title be?

     billwurtz dot com / reality

1.21.18  3:57 pm   do you still use this?

     yes

1.21.18  3:21 pm   How long does it take to make a new song compared to how long it takes to make the crazy batshit video 

     about 10%

1.21.18  3:18 pm   Are u an optimistic nihilist?

     what the heck is a nihilist

1.21.18  3:14 pm   are your lyrics supposed to mean something

     they are supposed to be meaningful

1.21.18  3:10 pm   Why u dont believe in god?

     god is a popular name. you'll have to be more specific

1.21.18  3:06 pm   I think you're cool and there's no other way to contact you

     other than what

1.21.18  2:45 pm   Do you still write? Or are you just making videos/songs from stuff you wrote before?

      in ladeda, everything after the 1st chorus was newly written. soap tips was entirely newly written. for 'outside,' everything except the title line was newly written. the 'movie star' video was based on a recording that was released 2 months prior, which was newly written except for the title line. hi i'm steve was newly written. 'got to know' was newly written except for the title. 'i love you' was written in 2009/2012, and the instruments were recorded in 2015, but then newly underwent a massive lyric swap in 2017. california was written in 2011/2013, and recorded in 2017. history of the entire world was written in summer/fall of 2016 and recorded immediately after. alphabet shuffle was partially written in 2012, 2014, and 2016. old mcdonald was written in 2014. snail time was newly written. what is love was newly written. i'm not sure if that answers your question

1.21.18  2:32 pm   Someone has help you to edit your videos

     i wish

      or you do it alone

     yes

1.21.18  2:26 pm   why am i not able to ask what the password is?

     to what

1.21.18  2:06 pm   how do you decide weather to answer a question with a serious answer or a silly one

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

1.21.18  1:56 pm   What was your inspiration for writing La de da de da de da de day oh?

     music, good and bad times, joy, self expression, and understanding

1.21.18  1:28 pm   i want to get into making music, but I know absolutely nothing about music theory. i've seen a lot of artists that i like get hate for not knowing it and i really don't want to get backlash for it. i'd be making music digitally, but could you give any advice? do you think learning music theory is even all that necessary?

     you can try to make a music theory, but the music is only going to find a new way to evade the theory. happens every time, it's the darndest thing

1.21.18  1:23 pm   Should life be taken seriously? 

      check the manual (if you can find it)

1.21.18  1:22 pm   hey bill, who makes that little 3/4ths-scale guitar you do your rhythm parts with? is that a guild or a taylor? also what gauge strings are you into?

     i won't talk about brands without having a legit sponsorship deal in place, but it was the only one on the wall at manny's, on 5/18/09, and it was for a very clearance price. the tuning is d, g, b, e. so it's like a guitar without the low e+a. and the name of the instrument starts with a U

1.21.18  12:57 pm   Does "I'm crazy/it's raining" have a point, or am I imagining a story to go with nothing?

     it's like when you crash land at home and you feel like your entire life is behind you. yet are you crazy for believing it might be actually still in front of you. and it's also raining

1.21.18  12:56 pm   Do you think that you will ever stop being a musician?

     no

1.21.18  12:47 pm   Are you planning on writing your autobiography anytime soon? Will you wait until you are old? Are you looking forward to writing it?

     i tend to do them on a pretty regular basis

1.21.18  12:35 pm   Do you like alpacas?

     not as much as your neighbour, friend, grandma, cousin, and milkman all do

1.21.18  12:15 pm   How long did the the song La de da day take you to make

     you don't wanna know

     and did it turn out similar to how you envisioned it at first?

     yes

     Cheers.

1.21.18  11:15 am   when will the site have better css

     when it matters

1.21.18  11:01 am   How long does it take to make a P E R F E C T video?

     0 seconds

1.21.18  10:53 am   Does the length at which you reply to a question indicate whether the question is good/bad or interesting/boring?

     no

1.21.18  10:27 am   did you stop making videos on youtube?

     i never made videos on youtube. i make them offline, and then post them to my website when they're done, and also post them on youtube

1.21.18  10:15 am   what forced you to make merch? i mean you don't like the idea of it and you should be entitled to what you want to do, so what happened?

     pressure from society

1.21.18  10:09 am   Do you really wanna be a movie star or do you just like writing songs about being a movie star?

Asking for a friend

     i have only written 1 song about being a movie star

1.21.18  10:08 am   Why was the first ever question "where has the fun gone" ? 

     ah, that would be a question for the person who asked that question

1.21.18  9:34 am   my parents constantly check my room. i feel bad about it. i try to reason with them about my right to privacy, but they just won't listen. they say: you got nothing to hide. i know it's absurd but it seems like the absurdity can't get across to them. how can i do? i feel bad... 

     have you thought about checking their room?

1.21.18  9:33 am   Do you like your fans?

     i hardly know who any of them are

1.21.18  9:30 am   Do all of your songs have a hidden meaning behind them or not?

     the meaning of all my songs is 'hey check out this song i made' but it's not hidden

1.21.18  9:23 am   why do you make short videos?

     so they can be released sooner

1.21.18  9:21 am   why are you always saying "without you" or "i miss you" in your videos? 

     i can't recall ever saying that, but i might have (i've made a lot of videos) but that's certainly not something i say very often. maybe once

1.21.18  8:52 am   If you can change the definition of one word, which word would ot be and what would that word's definition be?

     i would change good to mean bad

1.21.18  8:20 am   can we have more reality videos please?

     sure but it will make the regular videos take longer

1.21.18  7:44 am   what is your opinion on communism

     i think it's off to a great start

1.21.18  7:35 am   what should i do if i have a passion to play music and paint but i'm not free to do whaterver i want to because of school and work

     use the very small amount of time you have, to do it

1.21.18  7:18 am   how come you're not supposed to stick cotton swabs in your ears?

     your ears might get too clean

1.21.18  7:07 am   do you have any plans to put your music on the google play store?

     i think it posts automatically to youtube also, so i'm holding off on google play until i know for sure that it's not gonna cause conflict with my youtube channel. although i do have several songs on google play already

1.21.18  5:30 am   Do you think aliens exist?

     everyone is aliens
1.21.18  5:08 am   have you ever thought about this- while you are just one person replying to these questions, there could be just one person typing every question you answer?

1.21.18  4:58 am   how do i look for an explanation?

     just look around, until you feel like the thing has been explained. if you never find an explanation, you could try making one up

1.21.18  4:30 am   how many letters are in the alphabet 

     different alphabets have different amounts of letters. but the one i use has about 26

1.21.18  4:05 am   what do I do when someone doesn't show up

     call or send them a message, and if you don't see or hear from them in 13 minutes, leave. and enjoy some extra free time that you would not have had if the person had shown up

1.21.18  3:57 am   How does it feel to have people scrutinizing your every action?

     it's a powerful learning experience

      Better than the alternative (no-one paying attention)? That being said, I see you've not been tweeting in the past couple days,

     just 1

     what's up man

     that was a mistake. there was supposed to be one about sandwiches last night, but it didn't come out. there must have been a glitch in the system. but today i will do 2, and there will continue to be 1 a day. i apologize for any inconvenience

1.21.18  3:43 am   What is the favorite thing that you have currently done?

     the thing i am currently doing

1.21.18  3:36 am   how did you become so popular?

     by making independent content ruthlessly and passionately with no plan of ever stopping

1.21.18  3:11 am   What's your view on life?

     sounds like something that could really take off
